mapper.select: SELECT p.menuid, p.menuname ,p.menupath,p.paremenuid FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ru ON u.uid = ru.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.rid = ru.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON r.rid = rp.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.menuid = rp.menuid WHERE u.username ='#{0}'

SELECT p.menuid,p.mid, p.menuname ,p.menupath,p.paremenuid FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ru ON u.uid = ru.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.rid = ru.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON r.rid = rp.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.menuid = rp.menuid WHERE u.username =#{username} AND p.`paremenuid`=0
